# kiwi-skeleton

## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                         | Type                     | Default       |
| -------- | --------- | --------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------ | ------------- |
| `rows`   | `rows`    | Number of skeleton rows.                            | `number`                 | `4`           |
| `type`   | `type`    | The kind of element this skeleton should represent. | `"paragraph" \| "table"` | `'paragraph'` |
